mapper.select: select aps.user_id from app_personal_setting aps left join app_setting_type ast on ast.id=aps.setting_id where ast.classify='push' and ast.tag=#{tag} and aps.on_off=1
select count(1) from app_personal_setting aps left join app_setting_type ast on ast.id=aps.setting_id where ast.classify='push' and ast.tag=#{tag} and aps.on_off=0 AND aps.user_id=#{userId}
